properties.entry: SELECT CI.CAMP_NAME, CI.ADDRESS, CI.LOCATION_1, CI.LOCATION_2, LISTAGG(NA.NATURAL_ATTRI,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(CN.NATURAL_NO)) AS NATURAL_ATTRI FROM CAMP_NATURAL CN JOIN CAMP_INFO CI ON(CN.CAMP_NO = CI.CAMP_NO) JOIN "NATURAL" NA ON(CN.NATURAL_NO = NA.NATURAL_NO) GROUP BY CI.ADDRESS,CI.LOCATION_1,CI.LOCATION_2, CI.CAMP_NAME ORDER BY CI.CAMP_NAME
